entertainment.name: film
entertainment.description: T'Challa, heir to the hidden but advanced kingdom of Wakanda, must step forward to lead his people into a new future and must confront a challenger from his country's past.

entertainment.name: tv show
entertainment.description: Nine noble families fight for control over the mythical lands of Westeros, while an ancient enemy returns after being dormant for thousands of years.

entertainment.name: musical
entertainment.description: The play has two acts, telling Hamilton's story through major events in his life and American history. It tells Hamilton's life from beginning to end along with various other characters.

entertainment.name: animation
entertainment.description: An animated series that follows the exploits of a super scientist and his not-so-bright grandson.

vehicles.name: BMW
vehicles.description: The groundbreaking BMW X7 combines innovative design and inspiring presence.

vehicles.name: BMW
vehicles.description: The beginning of something new. It keeps your engine running, every day. Your heart beats to the rhythm of the BMW F 750 GS. It's your ticket to the adventure.
